books.author: by Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of the recently deceased entrepreneur, based on 40 interviews with Jobs conducted over two years.
books.name: STEVE JOBS

books.author: by Bill O'Reilly and Martin Dugard
books.description: The anchor of “The O’Reilly Factor” recounts the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
books.name: KILLING LINCOLN

books.author: by Todd Burpo with Lynn Vincent
books.description: A father recounts his 3-year-old son’s encounter with Jesus and the angels during an appendectomy.
books.name: HEAVEN IS FOR REAL

books.author: by Glenn Beck and Kevin Balfe
books.description: How Washington turned himself into the indispensable (if imperfect) man.
books.name: BEING GEORGE WASHINGTON

books.author: by Laura Hillenbrand
books.description: An Olympic runner’s story of survival as a prisoner of the Japanese in World War II.
books.name: UNBROKEN

books.author: by Robert K. Massie
books.description: The author of “Nicholas and Alexandra” provides a sweeping narrative of the life of the minor 18th-century German princess who became Empress of All the Russias.
books.name: CATHERINE THE GREAT

books.author: by Daniel Kahneman
books.description: The winner of the Nobel in economic science discusses how we make choices in business and personal life and when we can and cannot trust our intuitions.
books.name: THINKING, FAST AND SLOW

books.author: by Chris Matthews
books.description: An admiring portrait of the 35th president.
books.name: JACK KENNEDY

books.author: by Ann Rule
books.description: True-crime stories of people in danger.
books.name: DON'T LOOK BEHIND YOU

books.author: by Michael Lewis
books.description: A look at some of the places hardest hit by the financial collapse of 2008 and at how it happened.
books.name: BOOMERANG

books.author: by Bill Clinton
books.description: The former president argues that cooperation between the private sector and government is necessary to restore prosperity.
books.name: BACK TO WORK

books.author: by Diane Keaton
books.description: The actress uses her mother’s diaries as a springboard for the examination of her own life.
books.name: THEN AGAIN

books.author: by Mindy Kaling
books.description: Observations from the comedy writer and actress.
books.name: IS EVERYONE HANGING OUT WITHOUT ME?

books.author: by Peter Schweizer
books.description: Insider trading in Congress and how it enriches the permanent political class.
books.name: THROW THEM ALL OUT

books.author: by Rebecca Skloot
books.description: The story of a woman whose cancer cells were cultured without her permission in 1951.
books.name: THE IMMORTAL LIFE OF HENRIETTA LACKS
